task-wr.title: Setting the CPU Scaling Range Using the CLI
task-wr.shortdesc: You can define the maximum and minimum CPU resources available to an instance by using a flavor using the CLI.

li.p: To set the maximum number of VCPUs for an instance, define a flavor with the required number of vCPUs.
To set the minimum number of vCPUs, edit the flavor to include an Extra Spec. The minimum cannot be less than one.
